name: Chess Club
description: Join the Chess Club to improve your chess skills and participate in friendly competitions.

name: Photography Club
description: Explore the world of photography with like-minded individuals and capture stunning images.

name: Debate Society
description: Sharpen your communication and critical thinking skills through lively debates on various topics.

name: Coding Club
description: Learn programming languages, work on exciting coding projects, and collaborate with fellow coders.

name: Sports Club
description: Stay fit and have fun participating in various sports activities with other sports enthusiasts.

name: Art Club
description: Unleash your creativity and express yourself through various art forms like painting, drawing, and sculpture.

name: Music Club
description: Discover the joy of music and join fellow musicians to create melodious tunes and perform together.

name: Science Club
description: Explore the wonders of science through hands-on experiments, discussions, and scientific discoveries.

name: Environmental Club
description: Take part in initiatives and activities focused on raising awareness and caring for the environment.

name: Dance Club
description: Express yourself through the art of dance and learn various dance styles with fellow dance enthusiasts.
